className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

direction.description: The direction that the scrub area should change the value.

pixelSensitivity.description: Determines the number of pixels the cursor must move before the value changes. A higher value will make the scrubbing less sensitive.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.

teleportDistance.description: If specified, how much the cursor can move around the center of the scrub area element before it will loop back around.
